A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Excellent. For Star Wars fans who love film rather than those obsessed with the mythology. The film has a different rhythm and more humour than other Star Wars films but it is still very much a Star Wars movie. The plot may not be what the fanboys wanted\, but this is a film happy to challenge what we thought we knew and where we thought the story was going. A great movie in its own right but also injecting something new into a franchise so close to my heart. Thank heavens for freshening up the Star Wars galaxy and setting it up for another few decades and a new generation. My 8 year old son loved it too.
